item.title: Corrective RAG ü§ù Mistral Corrective RAG was a new RAG technique published a few weeks ago Mistral models are taking the world by storm A perfect co...
item.description:
Corrective RAG ü§ù Mistral

Corrective RAG was a new RAG technique published a few weeks ago

Mistral models are taking the world by storm

A perfect combination!


Sophia Yang, Ph.D.:‚ÄÇCorrective RAG with @LangChainAI LangGraph and @MistralAI.
- Grade documents for relevance relative to the question.
- If any are irrelevant, then we will supplement the context used for generation with web search.
- For web search, we will re-phrase the question and use Tavily‚Ä¶

item.title: Corrective RAG Corrective RAG (CRAG) is a recent paper that uses self-reflection to identify and correct problems in retrieval. It first uses a retrie...
item.description:
Corrective RAG

Corrective RAG (CRAG) is a recent paper that uses self-reflection to identify and correct problems in retrieval.

It first uses a retrieval evaluator to assess the quality of retrieved documents relative to the query.

It filters out irrelevant documents and‚Ä¶

item.description:
Self-Reflective RAG using LangGraph

Self-reflection can enhance RAG, enabling correction of poor quality retrieval or generations.

Several recent papers focus on this theme, but implementing the ideas can be tricky.

Here is a video and two cookbooks that show how to engineer‚Ä¶

item.title: RT Tomaz Bratanic: Got the first version of using Mixtral via @ollama to power a @LangChainAI agent that interacts with @neo4j via a semantic layer. I...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇTomaz Bratanic
Got the first version of using Mixtral via @ollama to power a @LangChainAI agent that interacts with @neo4j via a semantic layer. I'll make it into a LangChain template and write a blog about it. You can take a sneak peek here: https://github.com/tomasonjo/blogs/blob/master/llm/ollama_semantic_layer.ipynb
